attributes.action: Allow only nationalized British citizens to have their citizenship revoked
attributes.additional_details: It's has been the case that even people that had that happen to them were done unlawfully. Other countries like Canada and Ireland Do Not permit stripping of citizenship for those who were citizens by birth or descent.
attributes.background: I want the Home Office to only have the power to revoke "strip" citizenship from only those that are nationalized but only for fraud reasons. People that are British born including those by descent should be exempt from that rule with no exceptions.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure what you mean by "nationalized British citizens" and we're not sure whether you want this only to be in cases of fraud. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
